Title: Admin console and moderation tools

Description:
Create an admin interface for managing users, providers, directions/categories, institution hierarchies, and reviewing moderator drafts. Include history/logging and basic statistics.

Acceptance criteria:
- Admin-only UI for user/provider/direction management.
- Endpoints for fetching logs and basic statistics.
- Moderator draft review UI with approve/reject actions.

Labels: enhancement, admin, backend, frontend
Estimate: L
